skills.title: Container Orchestration
skills.description: Expertise in creating scalable and resilient container environments using industry best practices.

skills.title: Cloud Infrastructure
skills.description: Proficient in designing, implementing, and managing cloud infrastructure on AWS. Experienced in setting up secure, scalable, and highly available cloud environments following best practices for cloud architecture.

skills.title: CI/CD GitOps
skills.description: Skilled in implementing continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines. Experienced with GitOps workflows to automate infrastructure and application delivery with improved reliability and auditability.

skills.title: Infrastructure As Code
skills.description: Proficient in defining and provisioning infrastructure using code. Experienced with tools that enable consistent and repeatable infrastructure deployment, reducing manual processes and minimizing human error.

skills.title: Monitoring & Observability
skills.description: Skilled in implementing comprehensive monitoring and observability solutions. Experienced with tools that provide real-time insights into system performance, helping to proactively identify and resolve issues.

skills.title: Scripting & Automation
skills.description: Proficient in writing efficient scripts to automate repetitive tasks and streamline workflows. Experienced in developing automation solutions that improve operational efficiency and reduce manual intervention.

skills.title: Security & Compliance
skills.description: Committed to implementing security best practices throughout the development lifecycle. Experienced in integrating security measures into CI/CD pipelines and ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations.

skills.title: Methodologies & Practices
skills.description: Well-versed in modern software development methodologies and best practices. Experienced in implementing Agile/Scrum methodologies, trunk-based development, and other practices that enhance team productivity and software quality.
